meanings.definition: A sitarist is a musician who plays the sitar.
meanings.sent1: The talented sitarists mesmerized the audience with their music.
meanings.sent2: Many sitarists travel around the world to share their music.
meanings.sent3: The sitarists decided to start a band called 'Strings of Harmony'.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced on the strings like skilled sitarists performing a symphony.
meanings.sent5: The sitarists' melodies floated through the air, painting a picture of serenity.

meanings.definition: Sitarists are skilled in playing the sitar.
meanings.sent1: The young sitarists practiced diligently to improve their skills.
meanings.sent2: Famous sitarists often inspire aspiring musicians to pursue their passion.
meanings.sent3: The sitarists' music was so enchanting that even birds stopped to listen.
meanings.sent4: Their precision in playing the sitar was like a group of synchronized dancers.
meanings.sent5: The sitarists' expertise shone brightly during the performance, captivating all who listened.

meanings.definition: The sitarists performed a beautiful concert.
meanings.sent1: After months of practice, the sitarists finally showcased their talent in a grand concert.
meanings.sent2: Audiences were moved by the emotional depth of the sitarists' performance.
meanings.sent3: The sitarists' concert was so good that even the moon seemed to applaud.
meanings.sent4: Their music filled the room like a warm embrace, wrapping the listeners in joy.
meanings.sent5: The sitarists' concert was a masterpiece, painting the night with vibrant melodies.

meanings.definition: She is one of the best sitarists in the world.
meanings.sent1: As one of the best sitarists, she continues to inspire a new generation of musicians.
meanings.sent2: Her reputation as a top sitarist is well-deserved due to her exceptional talent.
meanings.sent3: The sitarists' skills were so impressive that even the clouds gathered to listen.
meanings.sent4: Her music resonated with the audience, touching their hearts like a gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The sitarists' performance was a testament to her mastery of the instrument and artistry.
